name: Charge!
description:
"Charge!" is a strategy adventure game with an extremely exciting combat system, centered around building a team. Try out different combinations of armor sets, weapons, and relics to create a powerful and unique lineup!

Team

At the beginning of the game, you will have only three champions, but as you progress, more partners will join the team to fight against powerful enemies! Ultimately, you can build a battle team consisting of 10 elite members.

Roles

Plan each champion's role in battle and equip them with various gear and weapons to create a diverse lineup. You can shape your warriors into tough tanks, high-damage mages, one-hit-kill warriors, and sharpshooting hunters, among others. A well-designed team configuration will make it easier to deal with different types of enemies.

Equipments

Dozens of different pieces of gear can be used to construct various armor sets, which can be combined with dozens of weapons that have different effects, making your charge even more exciting!

Relics

Unlock dozens of powerful relics during battles. Unlike weapons, relics can provide buffs to the entire team.

Enemies

The game's battles are not easy. As you progress, the types, number, and strength of enemies will increase, making battles more and more intense! You will need to adjust your team configuration at any time according to the enemy's lineup, learn from your experiences, and use your brainpower to become stronger!
